works.description:
This app is pretending to be an official 

Android version of our popular desktop application "Internet Download  
Manager", often abbreviated as IDM.

They've stolen our description (please compare the app's description to
our  
description on internetdownloadmanager.com)

We are going to release an official Android version of our app very soon, 

so we hope this app will be removed.

Additionally, the app uses very intrusive advertising (push notifications 

to the status bar).

This developer has continually reuploaded this app. Previous versions
we've  
DMCA'd include:
